## packet admin update-sshkey

Update a SSH key: change the key or its label

### Synopsis


Update a SSH key: change the key or its label

```
packet admin update-sshkey
```

### Options

```
  -f, --file string     Read public key from file.
      --key-id string   SSH key ID
      --label string    Label to assign to the key
```
